e: ￹`O~ `todong~ `no~ `pising~ `nira~ `konini~.￺This painting represents him.￻這是他的肖像
￹`o~ `ci~`todong~`ay~ `cingra~ `tonini~ `a~ `tayal~.￺He is responsible for / the representative of this work.￻他是負責這項工作的
￹`O~ `cacitodong~ `cingra~ `to~ `adihay~`ay~ `a~ `tayal~.￺He will have responsibility for a lot of work.￻他將要負責繁重的工作
￹`Pa~`todong~`en~ `ko~ `malo~ `no~ `mako~ `a~ `toki~.￺Set aside time for me.￻煩請安排我的時間
